html:
ACCOUNTING AND FINANCE

A very warm welcome to the world of accounting and finance. This foundation course introduces you to the purpose and techniques of financial and management accounting and includes an introduction to the financial system. The course introduces double-entry bookkeeping, a system devised in the 15th century, which is still used to record the financial transactions undertaken by businesses.

Learning Objectives:

+  Identify and explain the key purposes and concepts of accounting and finance

+  Use established techniques to produce financial information which will enable users of the information to make informed economic choices

+  Interpret these financial statements while appreciating the inadequacies of these models

+  Outline the functions of the financial system, markets and institutions and understand data published in the financial media.

Module Content:
